items.title: Customer Delight Executive (high growth startup) MB0042 Moneybox – London SE1
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=6, nodejs=1, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=1}
items.content:
*About Moneybox*

A generation is growing up without the tools or information they need to confidently build their financial future.

Whether the next goal is getting on the property ladder, starting their own business or paying for the big day, they are not being supported effectively by current providers.

For many, the concept of ‘wealth’ seems alien; it seems both too general and something only other people have.

That’s because there isn’t enough help available;

* the ‘wealth management’ industry is set up for those who already have wealth, not those who need to build it.
* banks are focused on selling products rather than helping people to achieve financial outcomes.
* financial planning is not taught at school or at work.

All of this means people don’t know where to start, taking part feels alien and unachievable everything seems very complicated

*Our ambition is to help a generation invest in their future.*

* Moneybox is on a mission to change the way people save and invest toward their future. Forget old-school finance - we make saving and investing part of your everyday life and help you achieve your goals, be it buying a house, saving for your children or something much more frivolous!
* Moneybox enables you to invest the change from your everyday purchases into simple tracker funds. For example, when you buy your morning coffee for £2.40, you can invest the 60p change into tracker funds within your ISA. This means that a you can set money aside to invest before you’ve finished your breakfast – not a bad start to the day!
* We have won multiple awards, and are currently one of the fastest growing fintech apps in the UK.
* We were founded in July 2015 by serial entrepreneurs Ben Stanway and Charlie Mortimer and currently have a team of 30. We expect to double this in the next year.
* We are authorised and regulated by the FCA and are backed by some of the UK’s leading venture capital investors.


*Job Brief*

We are currently growing at a rapid pace with more and more people using Moneybox. To support this exciting growth, we’re looking for someone to join our Customer Delight team and ensure that Moneybox continues to be known for taking pride in ‘delighting’ both existing and potential customers. We want to go above and beyond wherever we can and ensure that using the service is a great experience.

Working days: Five days per week which will include one weekend day (where you can work from home).


*What You’ll Do*

* Interact with current and potential customers through Intercom to address any queries they have.
* Collaborate with the Operations and Compliance team to ensure a great customer experience.
* Work with the Product team to continually improve the customer experience.
* Look for ways to go ‘above and beyond’ to make customers happy.
* Ad-hoc projects.


*What we’re looking for*

* A driven, ambitious individual who’s looking to build their career at an exciting very- fast-growing company.
* Naturally personable, great communicator who has a passion for their work and the people they work with
* Excited about being part of a fast-growing company that’s trying to make a positive mark on the world
* Knows have to have fun whilst maintaining a professional outlook


*Experience and Skills*

* Excellent written and spoken English
* Ability to work well both individually and as part of a team
* Good analytical and problem solving skills
* A ‘high-output do-er’ with a desire to work in a fast-paced, fast-changing start up environment

Bonus points for:

* Explaining clearly in introduction email why you think Moneybox is exciting and why you believe you are a great candidate.
* Direct experience with Intercom or similar customer service platforms.


*What’s in it for you?*

* Opportunity to join a fast-growing, award-winning and super ambitious startup
* Work with a friendly team of highly motivated individuals
* Be in an environment where you are listened to and can actually have an impact
* Thriving collaborative and inclusive company culture
* Competitive remuneration package
* Potential for company share options
* 25 days holiday + bank holidays

Our office is in London, by the Oxo Tower


PEASE NOTE:

By sending us your application you acknowledge and agree to Moneybox using your personal data as described below. We collect applicants’ personal data to manage our recruitment related activities. Consequently, we may use your personal data to evaluate your application, to select and shortlist applicants, to set up and conduct interviews and tests, to evaluate and assess the results, and as is otherwise needed in the recruitment process generally.

We do not share your personal data with unauthorised third parties. However, we may, if necessary, share your personal data to carefully selected third parties acting on our behalf. This may include transfers to servers and databases outside the country where you provided us with your personal data. Such transfers may include for example transfers and/or disclosures outside the European Economic Area and in the United States of America.

If you are unsuccessful in your application, we may keep your details on file so that we can tell you about other suitable vacancies which may be of interest to you when they arise in the future. If you would rather we did not keep your details on file, you can contact us at email: jobs(at)moneyboxapp.com

items.title: Director Of Engineering
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=5, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=8}
items.content:
Director Of Engineering


Auth0


Auth0, a global leader in Identity-as-a-Service (IDaaS), provides thousands of enterprise customers with a Universal Identity Platform for their web, mobile, IoT, and internal applications. Our extensible platform seamlessly authenticates and secures more than 1.5B logins per month, making it loved by developers and trusted by global enterprises. Auth0 has raised more than $110 million to date and is continuing its global growth at a rapid pace. We are consistently recognized as a great place to work based our outstanding leadership and dedication to company culture, and are looking for the best people to join our incredible team spread across more than 35 countries!

Due to explosive growth Auth0 is seeking a Director of Engineering to help lead and scale our software development and innovation efforts to deliver the most advanced authentication and authorization SaaS on the market. This is a full time technical leadership role overseeing the growth of our highly productive teams of smart and engaged engineers. Successful candidates will be located on the west coast in PST (UTC−8 or within 3 hours) OR London metro area (UTC+1).

Auth0 has been remote-first since inception and fully embraces a remote workstyle. VP’s and C level execs work remote and we have the tools and resources in-place to ensure success. Not only are we looking for a talented Engineering leader, we are looking for someone who will contribute to our culture.

You will:


* Work closely with our Team Leads, Engineering Directors and VP of Engineering to help scale our Engineering Organization to meet our customer and product needs.

* Lead, mentor and coach a mix of new and seasoned engineering managers running widely distributed teams.

* Work closely with Product & Design to build the next generation of Identity products.

* Provide operational excellence and implement processes and policies that create efficiencies during a time of massive growth.

* Maintain our high security, performance and availability SLA’s as we rapidly scale for customers with 100M+ monthly active users.

* Lead teams that continuously ship product improvements, measures the results, and iterateHelp convert our systems to be service based and cloud agnostic.

* Define and execute engineering and company wide OKR’s.




About you:


* You have experienced high-growth in a short period of time and are comfortable with putting systems in place and adjusting and adapting when needed.

* You are comfortable leading and managing widely distributed teams (Geography and Time).  This is core to our culture and even our VP of Engineering is remote.

* You care about culture and values and like to be a steward for values such as transparency, collaboration, inclusiveness, accountability and experimentation.

* You have experience managing, coaching and growing other engineering managers and team leads. We have a strong culture of promoting from within so we are looking for someone who is comfortable grooming first-time managers.

* You set clear goals and clear expectations for your team. Your goal is to to empower your teams to make decisions and your managers to one day do your job.  

* You work closely with your peer organizations to ensure cross-team collaboration is effective.

* You have outstanding communication and presentation skills including the ability to effectively interface with business, executive, and technical teams.

* You have built and scaled distributed systems on public clouds (Amazon, Azure, GCP, etc.).

* You are open about technology choices, and like to contribute to OSS projects. Our current stack focuses on Node, ElasticSearch, MongoDB, and React but we focus on picking the right tools for the job.

* You have experience allocating and deploying resources across teams and managing to a budget.

* You are located in PST (UTC−8 or within 3 hours) OR London, UK metro area (UTC+1).

* You ideally have experience in the identity and access management (IAM) domain (not required).




Auth0 fosters an inclusive workplace free from discrimination. Auth0 is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. Auth0 conducts all employment-related activities without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, age, sex, marital status, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, genetics, or status as a Vietnam-era special disabled and other covered veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Auth0 participates in E-Verify and will confirm work authorization for candidates residing in the United States.

See more jobs at Auth0

items.title: Engineering Manager
items.content:
Contact us remotejobr->gmail.com

Engineering Manager

Headquarters: Berlin
URL: https://travisci.workable.com/jobs/793429

Description

Travis CI is looking for an engineering manager to join our engineering team. Engineering managers help our developers stay focused, organize their work, and keep track of progress on project and company goals.

The main goal of an engineering manager is a healthy and effective team. This involves developing and implementing software development processes and frameworks with the team, facilitating team communication, and supporting developers’ professional growth.

Requirements

We are looking for candidates with 4+ years of experience of engineering management or equivalent experience. Experience with remote and widely distributed teams is preferred. We welcome and encourage people from diverse backgrounds to apply. Travis CI seeks to increase the ratio of women in software engineering and development, and we especially encourage women and people from underrepresented (underestimated!) groups to apply for this position.

Team Focus


  • Help developers organize and plan their work, and track team progress on development project goals.
  • Remove roadblocks holding up the team’s or individual member’s progress.
  • Plan and help manage the development team schedule; balancing the company’s needs with the individuals’ preferences for work schedule.
  • Have an architectural overview of our systems and discuss technical decisions with your team; encourage quality in engineering to maintain and improve the reliability of our product.
  • Participate in code reviews and occasionally do hands-on development work like pair-programming.
  • Help manage our support and on-call rotations.

Communication


  • Ensure communication between developers and other departments (especially Product, Creative, and Customer Support) is bi-directional and effective for building required deliverables and developer satisfaction.
  • Implement and manage tools that increase visibility of developer work.
  • Participate in planning sessions with product management.
  • Help to improve remote collaboration within our distributed team.

Professional Growth


  • Hold 1:1 meetings that foster professional development and track progress on employee-specific goals.
  • Help employees to align personal career goals with company initiatives and needs.

To apply: Send a resume here: https://travisci.workable.com/jobs/793429/candidates/new

items.title: Business Development Manager
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=6, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
We are looking for someone to manage the end-to-end process from lead generation all the way through to closing the deals. You have a proven track record of winning new business and love doing it.

As Business Development Manager, your main focus will be to pro-actively win new business.

You have 2+ years experience, you just get it.

You will work toward quarterly targets with very favourable commission on top of your base salary, if you overachieve then you will earn even more, it will be uncapped.

You will find leads from multiple sources including online and at events, as well as travel frequently - where ever the business is.

We have offices in London and Leeds and believe in flexibility, so you can work remotely if that's your style.

- Every day you will be prospecting to find new leads from multiple sources.
- Qualification of leads and opportunities.
- Building proposals.
- Briefing the senior team when leads go to sales.
- Owning and refining the sales cycle.
- You will master sales automation.
- You own your own pipeline and know how to fill it with quality leads.
- You are amazing at networking, you know what events to go to and what ones are a waste of time.
- You can sell marketing, creative or branding.
